name: coveralls
notes: Coveralls is a code coverage reporting service and CLI tool for uploading test coverage reports (from Istanbul, Jest, Mocha, etc.) to the Coveralls.io SaaS platform. Exclusively used in CI/CD pipelines and development workflows (via CLI commands like 'coveralls < coverage/lcov.info') during testing, not for runtime execution in Workers. Similar coverage reporting tools include Codecov, Code Climate.
